entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then a few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
